 class ProviderClassHandler
          add providers classes via the API input is a file config/providers.prop in the extensions dir providers are added via the API and are thus merged with the original providers.prop

          add providers via the API input is a file config/providers.xml in the extensions dir providers are added via the API and are thus merged with the original providers.xml
 class SingleFileCopyHandler
           
 class WidgetClassHandler
          add providers classes via the API input is a file config/widgets.prop in the extensions dir providers are added via the API and are thus merged with the original widgets.prop Implementation note: Ignores widget.prop lines with legacy notation (classname=true|false) and prints a warning to the installation log if such line was encountered.
